mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM REQ_SUBJECT WHERE STATUS = 'N'

SELECT A.REQSUB_NO, A.DEPT_CODE, B.DEPT_TITLE, A.SUB_DIVS, A.SUB_TYPE, A.SUB_TITLE, C.PROF_NAME, A.SUB_CREDIT, A.SUB_TIME, A.REQ_TYPE, A.STATUS, A.SUB_CODE FROM REQ_SUBJECT A LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.DEPT_CODE=B.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN PROFESSOR C USING (PROF_ID) WHERE STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY REQSUB_NO DESC

SELECT A.SUB_CODE, A.REQSUB_NO, A.DEPT_CODE, B.DEPT_TITLE, A.SUB_DIVS, A.SUB_TYPE, A.SUB_TITLE, C.PROF_ID, C.PROF_NAME, A.SUB_CREDIT, A.SUB_TIME, A.REQ_TYPE, A.STATUS, A.ATT_ORIGIN, A.ATT_CHANGE FROM REQ_SUBJECT A JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.DEPT_CODE=B.DEPT_CODE JOIN PROFESSOR C ON A.PROF_ID=C.PROF_ID WHERE REQSUB_NO= #{sno} AND STATUS= 'N'
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM SUBJECT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT A.SUB_CODE, A.DEPT_CODE, B.DEPT_TITLE, A.SUB_DIVS, A.SUB_TYPE, A.SUB_TITLE, A.PROF_ID, C.PROF_NAME, A.SUB_CREDIT, A.SUB_CLASS, A.SUB_TIME, A.SUB_YEAR, A.SUB_SMST, A.STATUS, A.ORIGIN_NAME FROM SUBJECT A JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.DEPT_CODE=B.DEPT_CODE JOIN PROFESSOR C ON A.PROF_ID=C.PROF_ID WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.SUB_CODE DESC
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO LECT_EVALUATE C USING (SELECT B.LECT_REG_NO AS LECT_REG_NO , B.STU_ID AS STU_ID , B.YEAR AS YEAR , B.SEMESTER AS SEMESTER FROM LECT_REGISTER B WHERE 1=1) D ON (C.LECT_REG_NO = D.LECT_REG_NO AND C.STU_ID = D.STU_ID AND QUESTION = QUESTION AND (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) <> D.YEAR) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (LECT_EVA_NO, LECT_REG_NO, STU_ID, QUESTION, YEAR, SEMESTER, STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_LECT_EVA_NO.NEXTVAL, D.LECT_REG_NO, D.STU_ID, #{question}, D.YEAR, D.SEMESTER, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT QUESTION, LECT_EVA_NO, LECT_REG_NO, STU_ID, SCORE, YEAR, SEMESTER, STATUS FROM LECT_EVALUATE
